short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Maimo anything from web and get key points instantly.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Say goodbye to line-by-line manual text scanning and say hello to instant access to essential information with one click.

With this extension, you can effortlessly:

— Extract key points from your daily web content, including call transcripts and industry research reports.
— ‘Maimo it’ to swiftly save content to your Maimo exobrain.

*Maimo is currently in Alpha testing. To use the Maimo Chrome extension, you need a Maimo account.
